history.proof: intros V H v k x H1. unfold subst_idx. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[HH1 | HH2] | HH3]. - reflexivity. - rewrite HH2. unfold var. sfirstorder use: gt_asym. - rewrite Nat.sub_1_r. sauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros V H v k x H1.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[HH1 | HH2] | HH3].
exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type H : Var V v : V k, x : nat H1 : k > x HH2 : x = k Unable to unify "(let (var) := H in var) k" with "v".

ctx: intros V H v k x H1.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[HH1 | HH2] | HH3].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros V H v k x H1.
destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[HH1 | HH2] | HH3].
exceptions.exn: In environment V : Type H : Var V v : V k, x : nat H1 : k > x HH3 : k < x Unable to unify "var x" with "var (Nat.pred x)".

original: intros V H v k x H1. unfold subst_idx. destruct (lt_eq_lt_dec x k) as [[HH1 | HH2] | HH3]. - reflexivity. - rewrite HH2. unfold var. reflexivity. - rewrite Nat.sub_1_r. reflexivity.
